content:
TicketCompatibilityMode Enum

Definition

Defines whether to use Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) or local time for the ticket expiration date for forms authentication.

In this Article

public enum TicketCompatibilityMode
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
TicketCompatibilityMode

Remarks

The ticket expiration date for ASP.NET forms authentication can be stored by using Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) or the local time. For compatibility between applications, and for compatibility between different versions of the .NET Framework, the ticket expiration time can be specified by using the ticketCompatilityMode attribute of the element. The default value for the ticketCompatibilityMode attribute is Framework20.

Fields

Framework20

Specifies that the ticket expiration date is stored as local time. This is the default value.
Framework40

Specifies that the ticket expiration date is stored as UTC.
